title: Other methods of electing directors
context: §414D-115 Other methods of electing directors. A corporation may provide in its articles or bylaws for the election of directors by members or delegates: (1) On the basis of chapter or other organizational unit; (2) By region or other geographic unit; (3) By preferential voting; or (4) By any other reasonable method. [L 2001, c 105, pt of §1; am L 2002, c 130, §51; am L 2003, c 87, §1; am L 2011, c 37, §9]
